title: Ineffable Husbands Crowley And Aziraphale's Best Moments! - Good Omens
author: ShippersGuideToTheGalaxy
comment: So what I'm hearing is you also want fic recs. Which I have...for days lol

broke: aziraphale is grateful that crowley saved his books in 1941 in a completely platonic way
woke: zira realizes that he’s in love with crowley after crowley saves his books
third eye opened: zira already knows he’s in love with crowley, but after crowley saves his books, zira realizes that crowley might just love him back

I got two favorite scenes

1: lord heal this bike
2: when Crowley asks Aziraphale to ran away with him. ( especially how Aziraphale says "Run away... Together?"
I also love the concept of god being the biggest wingwoman to exist and wanting to see those two get together.
crowley calling aziraphale angel could replace food and water
description:
Good Omens has exposed the mainstream to the love between Aziraphale and Crowley, launching  the Ineffable Husbands ship into a golden era. Explore some of their best most shippable moments here on Shippers Guide To The Galaxy.
